OOC: FYI. I would imagine that Tuscon is about the same size as
Optimus Primal, who is approximately 10 feet tall. Since Maximals
don;t size change all that much, the dragon mode should also be about
10 feet long, with the tail maybe giving him another 3 - 5 feet or
length and the wings perhaps almost the same width. he would not
feasibly be able to surround the  Preds, especailly as far out as they
are spaced. He can try to circle around, but that is a big circle.

> <OLD>
>
> " Look, below us.   THAT has no right happening.  Hydras has gone too far,
> and it's time he was put in his place!"
>
> With a roar of sheer rage, he turns on the surrounding Predacons releasing a
> powerful stream of fire, flames a bright hue of red, yellow and blue.
>
> " Now let's show Hydras what happens when he preys on innocent creatures!"

<NEW>

What stands before TUSCON is nearly ALL the Predacon forces. The
Fuzors SKYSHADOW, INJECTOR and BUZZCLAW seemed to be keeping watch
with CYCLONUS flhing lead along with SCOURGE and several sweeps.

DEEPSTRYKE floats high in the air as PHOBIA and BLACK RAZOR circle
about. as well as WASPINATOR who buzzes about angrilly as he watched.

They are all flying above miles and miles and miles of burning
dinosaurs. Beast and reptiles of all sorts! What sorts they were it is
difficult to tell, being as they are on fire as the Maximals approach.
The stench is hideous, and most of the trees and surrounding scrub is
burning along with the reptiles, the preds are darting all around the
super large burning pyre.

That is until TUSCON starts firing.

> <OLD Straight Shot & Talon>
>
> As Straight Shot rides with Talon, she picks up on Tucson's location and
> from a far, realizes what is now transpiring between him and Hydras!  Still
> in cross bow mode, she calibrates her systems and weight distribution to fit
> Talon's configurations, for optimal results.
>
> " Hydras!  Ohhh I can't believe he's gonna face off with him again!  He
> doesn't realize that he needs help!  Wait, Ohh good, he's not alone, Rodimus
> is with him.  But still, it doesn't hurt ta lend him a hand.  I better let
> Leo Prime in on this, he's probably wondering why Tucson isn't contacting
> him, which is something he's notorious for doing. "
>
> She opens her link to Leo Prime.
>
> " Leo Prime, it's me, Straight Shot.  Talon and I are reaching Tucson's
> location shortly and I'm sure he hasn't contacted you yet.  He's with
> Rodimus and now he's facing off with Hydras.  A lotta fire just got deployed
> and I'm definitely sure it wasn't from Hydras.  Tucson's in a really bad
> mood, and I think it's about ta get worse."

<NEW>

"This is Leo. Judging from your location we are at least several hours
from you, and that that is for those of us who can fly. You had better
get Tuscon reigned in until we can get there. Leo Prime. Out."

> <OLD - Straight Shot, Talon & Hydras>
>
> Much to Straight Shot's suspicion, Tucson does indeed have the look of an
> enraged predator on his draconic face.  What he wouldn't do to be able to
> sink his sharp claws into Hydras, tearing at his armor until there was
> nothing left.  Yet he holds enough restraint to hold back from doing so, for
> the time being.
>
> " Many innocent creatures who were native to this planet have lost their
> lives needlessly, no thanks to you and your reign of greed and destruction.
> This is NOT our planet and we have NO right taking away what belongs here!
> That is what brings me here, Hydras!  This planet deserves freedom and I am
> here to make sure it gets it!"
>
> He exclaims with a loud draconic roar, as smoke seeps out of his flaring
> nostrils as do a couple of white hot flames.
>
> With Rodimus still on his back, Tucson circles Hydras as the never ending
> coils of his long tail creates a ring around the enemy.
>
> "Rodimus, this is also your chance to take back something that was taken
> from you.  No holds barred, do what you feel is the right thing, and what
> you feel in your spark is rightful to your cause.  I will follow suit.  We
> will fight as one, and as one we will serve judgement to those who deserve
> it. "
>
> He remains in his circling pattern, waiting for Rodimus to direct him, in
> hopes to help build his confidence as an Autobot Commander.  At the same
> time, Tucson had to learn to control his greatest weakness, his
> uncontrollable temper which left unchecked, had the potential to turn him
> into an extremely dangerous individual.  Now that he takes on the role of a
> powerful creature, it would prove hard to quell the fire that burns deep
> within his spark.  He hoped that this partnership would help keep the
> balance between the both of them.  They would need that more than ever if
> they have hopes of stopping Hydras for good.
>

<NEW>

"Tuscon!" RODIMUS imperiously said from TUSCON's back. "That's alot of
Predacons out there. Unless you have some back up out here that I
don't know about we are a long way from home." RODIMUS looked around,
"I see Cyclonus, have you seen Hydras yet?"

It was not fear that moved RODIMUS in all this, but a warrior's
caution. Even the most fearless of warriors had to know when the odds
were stacked against them, and when they had even a snowball's chance
of winning a fight. As RODIMUS pulled out his rifle and targeted the
Predacons, he could not help wondering if he fires will it get them
all killed, and if TUSCON wanted to them to go down in some blaze of
glory.  Even two primes cannot stand up to the entire Predacon forces!

CYCLONUS and HYDRAS were by themsevles their equals and at the moment
HYDRAS was not visible, which made the situation even more dangerous.
And that was not counting all the other Predacons just waiting to blow
them out of the air.

"What are you doing here." CYCLONUS' voice came over the comlink over
a general frequency. "We have no quarel with you this night. Continue
firing on us and we will wipe you from the skies."

There was a wicked chuckle from SKYSHADOW, "I don't think these two
would try to take on the entire Predacon army. Maybe they came to be
the dino beasts along with us?"

"He is full of enough hot air." SCOURGE said, sounding almost eager to
fight. "Maybe he can put it to some good use." SCOURGE's sweeps began
to circle outwards their weapons charging but not yet firing.

"Finish burning the dinosaurs." CYCLONUS barked to the other Predacons
who seemed to be approaching. "Make sure none of the crazed beasts
rises again."

CYCLONUS, SCOURGE and the sweeps slid foward, "We will deal with these
intruders." DEEPSTRYKE PHOBIA and BLACK RAZOR slid in behind them.

DEEPSTRYKE sent HYDRAS a message alerting him to TUSCON's and RODIMUS'
appearance and the approach of a flying Maximal. (Talon)

(TAG)

Preston
